description: This file contains CMake functions for converting JSON strings into CMake-compatible strings by processing escape sequences and quotation marks.

methods.name: json_string_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a JSON string into a CMake string by removing quotes and processing escape sequences.

methods.name: json_string_ref_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a reference to a JSON string into a CMake string by dereferencing and processing.
